title: Cargo Mirror
description:
Bold industrial accents exude a funky New York loft vibe that makes an immediate impact to your space. The Cargo Mirror embodies true industrial design with warehouse style. It features a unique shipping container look panel with gunmetal finish enhancing all design elements. The open bottom shelf and three hooks are attached to the panel for easy access to your daily stuff like ties, phone, and car keys. Combining industrial chic with a utilitarian design, the Cargo Mirror adds a lot of energy and character to your room decor.
